name: Enspell
description:
Description of Enspell Game






“Enspell” is deck building-RogueLike game based on a medieval fantasy where you unravel secrets and explore to seek treasures.
While you fight against monsters in dangerous dungeons, you can collect relics and make your own deck.
Establish strategies with new decks every time and reach the end of the Dungeon, which is the final goal, and discover the secret in the castle!


Features

  • Battle with Card Replacement
    Replace cards during battles to pick up cards properly for situations and make the cards stronger through replacing them.



  • Monster Deck
    Monsters also do battles by picking up cards from the deck in the same way as players.
    So you should think about which card you will use in this turn according to the cards picked by the monster!


  • The Changing map
    The structure of the map changes for every new play.
    Make the best path for you and grow up through strategic battles.

Game goals

It is necessary to make wise choices at the crossroads of various choices to make the main character go into the deepest place of the dungeon.
Finally, you should win the final battle against the enemy in the deepest place of the dungeon so that the main character can achieve the true goal!
